settings.title: By investing extensively in advanced production technology, our primary objective is <bl>to manufacture the utmost premium products with unparalleled performance consistency.</bl>
Enhanced Precision Through Technology
settings.paragraph: In 2020, The Mothership became the first in the snowboard industry to introduce an NFC system in our snowboards. This chip enables precise tracking of <hl>each board's production journey</hl>, resulting in higher quality and reduced waste.

settings.title: Enhanced Experience Through Technology
settings.paragraph: Beyond the production floor, we have taken NFC capabilities to the next level. Now, you can <hl>connect with your board by simply scanning it with your phone</hl>. This NFC interface enables you to register your snowboard, streamlining the customer service process and granting exclusive early access to new product information, drops, and CAPiTA team videos exclusively for NFC-registered users.

settings.title: Thermal Insert Drilling
settings.paragraph: At many snowboard factories they are setting your inserts with a drill by hand. This leads to scrap pieces, poor quality and excess waste. At CAPiTA MFG we have invested in a thermal drilling machine that scans, identifies and then drills the precise location of each insert. This ensures the essential connection for your binding to snowboard will be sound, giving you confidence in a higher performing product.

settings.title: PLT Topsheet Technology
settings.paragraph: The traditional model is to press the topsheet on with the snowboard, and use lacquer to cover any imperfections. The Mothershipâ€™s proprietary PLT Topsheet Technology breaks that model and applies beautifully finished graphics to our snowboards without any telescoping from the fiberglass layers. No other snowboard design in the world can match the finish printing quality of a CAPiTA topsheet graphic.

settings.title: Fully Automated Finishing Lines
settings.paragraph: Computer programmed, and fully automated the grinding and finishing lines at The Mothership fine tune snowboards to perfection. This minimizes energy consumption in production and reduces material waste. As a final step, each board is hand inspected twice to ensure the most premium quality.
